pl_output:
`c/​/ snazzah.util helps shorten code and has useful functions. Ain't that nice?`
`Nfunction` `C() {`
  `Nlet` `Autil` `X=` `A#fs``C.``Asnazzah``C.``Mutil``C();`

  `c/​/ Shows [duration_ms] as time difference, good for displaying to users (negative numbers for past)`
  `c/​/ Ex. 5*60*60*1000 -> "in 5 hours"`
  `c/​/ ``C@returns``c [``CString``c] `
  `Autil``C.``MfmtDr``C(``Fduration_ms``C);` 

  `c/​/ Shows how much time was in between now and [date_epoch] using util​.fmtDr`
  `c/​/ ``C@returns``c [``CString``c] `
  `Autil``C.``MfrmNw``C(``Fdate_epoch``C);` 

  `c/​/ Divides [duration_ms] into a defined [type]`
  `c/​/ The [type] can be these values​: "ms", "s"(econds), "m"(inutes), "h"(ours),`
  `c/​/ "w"(eeks), "M"(onths), "y"(ears). (Returns NaN for invalid types)`
  `c/​/ ``C@returns``c [``CString``c|``CNaN``c] `
  `Autil``C.``MnAs``C(``Fduration_ms``C, ``Ftype``C);` 

  `c/​/ Returns [num] as roman numerals. Ex. 123 -> "CXXIII"`
  `c/​/ ``C@returns``c [``CString``c] `
  `Autil``C.``Mromn``C(``Fnum``C);`

  `c/​/ Abbreviates [num]. Ex. 12345 -> "1.2k"`
  `c/​/ ``C@returns``c [``CString``c] `
  `Autil``C.``Mabbr``C(``Fnum``C);` 

  `c/​/ Returns [num] as an ordinal number string Ex. 1 -> "1st"`
  `c/​/ ``C@returns``c [``CString``c] `
  `Autil``C.``Mord``C(``Fnum``C);` 
  
  `c/​/ Shorthand Functions`
  `Autil``C.``Asl``C.``A_` `X=` `A#fs``C.``Ascripts``C.``A​``Mlib``C();`
  `Autil``C.``AgL` `X=` `A#fs``C.``Ascripts``C.``Aget_level``C;`
  `Autil``C.``NM` `X=` `AMath``C.``Amax``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Am` `X=` `AMath``C.``Amin``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Afl` `X=` `AMath``C.``Afloor``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Ace` `X=` `AMath``C.``Aceil``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Arn` `X=` `AMath``C.``Arandom``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Ar` `X=` `AMath``C.``Around``C;`
  
  `c/​/ Shorthand scripts​.lib`
  `Autil``C.``Asl``C.``Acee` `X=` `Alib``C.``Acan_continue_execution``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Asl``C.``Accee` `X=` `Alib``C.``Acan_continue_execution_error``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Asl``C.``Acrs` `X=` `Alib``C.``Acreate_rand_string``C;`
  `Autil``C.``Asl``C.``A​``NCC` `X=` `Alib``C.``Acorruption_chars``C;`
  
  `c/​/ Shorthand Operations`
  `Autil``C.``MtL``C(``Fstr``C);` `c/​/ str​.toLowerCase()`
  `Autil``C.``MtU``C(``Fstr``C);` `c/​/ str​.toUpperCase()`
  `Autil``C.``MtLS``C(``Fobj``C);` `c/​/ obj​.toLocaleString()`
  `Autil``C.``Mcl``C(``Fmin``C, ``Fmax``C, ``Fnum``C);` `c/​/ Clamps [num] between [min] and [max]`
  `Autil``C.``MrA``C(``Farray``C);` `c/​/ Gets a random item from [array]`
  `Autil``C.``Mlp``C(``Fx``C, ``Ffunc``C);` `c/​/ Runs [func], [x] times, and returns the array of results (first func param is index)`
`C}`
